blob
part of the tidyverse 1.1.1.9001

Deprecated generic

Source: R/blob.R
as.blob.Rd

The as.blob() generic has been deprecated in favor of the as_blob() function (for users) and the vec_cast.blob() method (for implementers). Implement a vec_cast.blob.myclass() method to support coercing objects of your class to blobs. See vctrs::vec_cast() for more detail.

as.blob(x, ...)

Arguments

x

An object.
...

Passed on to methods.

Contents

  • Arguments

blob is a part of the tidyverse, an ecosystem of packages designed with common APIs and a shared philosophy. Learn more at tidyverse.org.
